title: phalahAravanu mADo
sahitya:
phalahAravanu mADo parama puruSa bhUlalane lakSmI kandarpa sahita


caraNam 1    kadaLi kembALe kittaLe kanji phalagaLu badari beLuvala jambIra drAkSEgaLu 
madhurada mAdALa mAvina haNgaLu tudi modalillada paripari phalagaLa
    caraNam 2    uttatti jambu nranga dALimbavu muttA dautumbara kAriyu kavaLi 
kattarisida kabbu palasu tenginakAyi ottida bELe nelagaDale kharjUra haNNa
    caraNam 3    hAlu sallare jEnutuppa sIkaraNiyu hAlu rasAyana beNNe sIyALu 
mUlOkadoDeya shrI purandara viTTalane pAlisO ninnaya karakanjadindali
